attributes.action: STOP the riots NOW! Bring in the Army!
attributes.additional_details:
Why hasn't order been restored already? It should have been dealt with and stopped within 24 hours of the riots starting!
The Police obviously can NOT handle this. Tazzers, Tear Gas...extreme methods to bring these rioters down haven't been used so far.
Law abiding citizens need to stop living in fear - the riots need to be bought to an end NOW!

So, consider a temporary curfew and bring in the tough guns...

BRING IN THE ARMY!

Let the Army do what it's good at, fight for our Country!
